job_tasks.phrase: Integrate ML models into deployable Python applications.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the task of incorporating machine learning models into software applications, which falls under traditional software engineering practices for deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in and lead design reviews with peers and stakeholders.
job_tasks.justification: Design reviews are a standard part of the software development lifecycle, involving technical discussion and collaboration to ensure the quality and direction of the software.

job_tasks.phrase: Review code developed by other developers and provide feedback to ensure the consistent application of team best practices.
job_tasks.justification: Code review is a fundamental software engineering practice aimed at improving code quality, consistency, and adherence to standards.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to system documentation and team knowledge sharing.
job_tasks.justification: System documentation and knowledge sharing are essential activities within software development teams to ensure maintainability, onboarding, and collaborative efficiency.

soft_skills.phrase: Participate in and lead design reviews with peers and stakeholders.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase highlights the need for collaboration with peers and communication with stakeholders during technical discussions.

soft_skills.phrase: Review code developed by other developers and provide feedback to ensure the consistent application of team best practices.
soft_skills.justification: Providing feedback on code and ensuring team best practices involves communication and collaboration with other developers.

soft_skills.phrase: Contribute to system documentation and team knowledge sharing.
soft_skills.justification: Knowledge sharing and documentation are key aspects of team communication and collaboration.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses exclusively on software engineering tasks (Macro-Category A), specifically integrating ML models into applications and participating in development processes like code reviews and documentation. There are no tasks related to model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or RAG (Macro-Category B). The role involves using ML models as part of a software product, fitting the definition of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and concise, with all responsibilities directly mapping to established software engineering practices. The mention of 'ML models' is specific enough to indicate an AI focus, but the core tasks are clearly within software development and integration.
